game.name: Night Janitor
game.shortDescription: A first-person horror game where you clean up after rowdy high school kids while also keeping a lookout for clues as to their disappearance. Scrub, vacuum, clean... die?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A first-person horror game where you clean up after rowdy high school kids while also keeping a lookout for clues as to their disappearance. Scrub, vacuum, clean... die?

reviewHighlights.text: x-- 7/10 --x A really fun little horror game, I quite enjoyed it. I do think the school could have been decorated better, specifically upstairs, as it...
